title: MPH: Hülkenberg mutiny earned podium, but it began with 1 lap in 2020
summary: Nico Hülkenberg's long-awaited first podium at Silverstone came after a virtuoso drive, but it only came about thanks to one unforgettable qualifying lap in 2020, asMark Hughesrecalls

qa_pairs.question: Which driver achieved their first podium finish at the Silverstone circuit?
What year did Nico Hülkenberg secure his first podium finish in Formula 1?
What was significant about the qualifying lap that led to Hülkenberg's podium?
wrong_options: It was the fastest lap of the season.
It was his slowest qualifying time.
It was the first lap he ever completed.
